-- Function: maxpaydate(numeric) CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION maxpaydate( p_c_invoice_id numeric) RETURNS timestamp with time zone AS $BODY$ DECLARE o_MaxPayDate timestamp with time zone; BEGIN SELECT maxpaydatetrx INTO o_MaxPayDate FROM C_Invoice i LEFT JOIN ( SELECT max(p.datetrx) as maxpaydatetrx, al2.c_invoice_ID FROM C_AllocationLine al2 INNER JOIN C_AllocationHdr ah on (al2.c_allocationhdr_id=ah.c_allocationhdr_id) INNER JOIN c_Payment p on al2.c_Payment_ID = p.c_Payment_ID WHERE al2.C_Charge_ID IS NULL AND ah.docstatus not in ('RE') GROUP BY al2.C_Invoice_ID) al1 on (i.C_Invoice_ID = al1.C_Invoice_ID) WHERE i.C_Invoice_ID=p_C_Invoice_ID;
RETURN o_MaxPayDate; END; $BODY$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;

-- Function: maxpaydate(NUMBER) CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION maxpaydate(p_c_invoice_id IN NUMBER) RETURN DATE AS o_MaxPayDate DATE; BEGIN SELECT maxpaydatetrx INTO o_MaxPayDate FROM C_Invoice i LEFT JOIN ( SELECT max(p.datetrx) as maxpaydatetrx, al2.c_invoice_ID FROM C_AllocationLine al2 INNER JOIN C_AllocationHdr ah on (al2.c_allocationhdr_id=ah.c_allocationhdr_id) INNER JOIN c_Payment p on al2.c_Payment_ID = p.c_Payment_ID WHERE al2.C_Charge_ID IS NULL AND ah.docstatus not in ('RE') GROUP BY al2.C_Invoice_ID ) al1 on (i.C_Invoice_ID = al1.C_Invoice_ID) WHERE i.C_Invoice_ID=p_C_Invoice_ID;
RETURN o_MaxPayDate; END maxpaydate;
